ca.corefacility.gview.map.items

Interface BackboneItem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, GViewEventListener, MapComponent, MapItem
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BackboneShapeItem, BackboneTextItem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBackboneShapeItem, AbstractBackboneTextItem, BackboneLabelItem, BackboneTextItemImp, BasicBackboneItem, BorderItem, FeatureItemImp, PlotItem

    public interface BackboneItem
extends MapItem
    An item which has a particular location on the backbone.
    Author:
    Aaron Petkau
